question: Himalayan region is poor in mineral resources for which of the following reason?
option1: The climatic conditions are not suitable for exploration of minerals
option2: The rugged terrain makes exploration of minerals difficult and costly
option3: Himalayan region is made up of crystalline rocks
option4: Displacement of rock strata has disturbed the arrangement of rocks and made it complex
answer: Displacement of rock strata has disturbed the arrangement of rocks and made it complex
explanation: The main reason why the Himalayan region is poor in mineral resources is the displacement of rock strata has disturbed the arrangement of rocks and made it complex.
